# repeatMode

**Instance Property**

The mode used to determine how the keyframe sequence repeats.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeatMode: SKRepeatMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are defined in [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKRepeatMode]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKRepeatMode/clamp].

## Interpolation Modifiers

- **interpolationMode**: The mode used to determine how values for times between the keyframes are calculated.
